local_intent: Perceive and approach-align to the green bottle, confirming target remains visible.
assumptions: Bottle remains reachable with unobstructed path during approach.
Perception will succeed within limited retries.
coherence_with_global: Implements the detect and approach/align phases consistent with the GLOBAL_BT before SetTCPYaw, Push, and Retreat; adheres to the plan and success criteria for non-grasp pushing preparation.
